events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop has several scratches on the screen and the keyboard keys are sticky. I am very disappointed with the product condition.
The customer's issue regarding scratches and sticky keys has been categorized under Product Defect for further handling.
The support case has been assigned to agent Jessica M. to handle the defective product report.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the sticky keys so we can better assess the damage?
I’ve attached several photos showing the scratches and issues with the keyboard as requested. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for sending the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement if possible. I like the product otherwise and hope the next unit will be free of defects.
Your request for a replacement has been processed. The new unit will be shipped within 3 business days, and we will send tracking information soon.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement laptop arrived in good condition and you are satisfied with it. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for confirming the satisfactory receipt of the replacement. We are closing this case now, but feel free to reach out anytime.
